CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, page 8, reads: "Thousands Attend Courier Home, Food Show...2. A part of the tremendous throng who sat through three nights of the Home Fair...Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Men and women standing in front of Thermoseal booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
